H0.text: If a chess player completes a move known as en passant, what pieces are involved. Knight

H1.text: If a chess player completes a move known as en passant, what pieces are involved. Bishop

H2.text: If a chess player completes a move known as en passant, what pieces are involved. Rook

H3.text: If a chess player completes a move known as en passant, what pieces are involved. Pawn

A4.text: Only pawns may capture or be captured en passant.

A5.text: The capturing pawn moves to the square that the enemy pawn passed over, as if the enemy pawn had advanced only one square.
